website_summaries.verdict: The low-top Puma Roma Retro Sports is a gem of a sneaker that has quality construction, a comfy wear, and a timeless design. It’s the perfect companion to wear to work or even just for a chill day out as and it matches well with a number of outfits.The sneaker though has been known to run a bit narrow, especially around the toes. Limited color options are a cause of disappointment to some. Still, the Puma Roma Retro Sports is overall a quality shoe, well built, and priced just right.
pros: Majority of those who bought the Puma Roma Retro Sports was quick to comment on how the shoes were very comfortable to wear
A good number of people who got the sneakers expressed how they wanted to buy another pair
One purchaser liked how the sneaker can carry over from a work outfit to a casual day wear vibe
At $70, many agree that the Puma Roma Retro Sports is decently priced
The shoes don’t go out of style, and this is a fact that most Puma fans and sneakerheads alike observed
Many have also praised how the shoes are very light and well built
Another reviewer said that he got a lot of compliments when wearing the kicks as it is stylish and has great colors to it
cons: Some people have noticed that the Puma Roma Retro Sports is a little bit narrow around the toe area
It has very limited colorway options

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Roma Basic Sneaker
product_meta.description: PUMA serves up a laid-back retro classic with this sleek sneaker. The roma is the stuff of PUMA archive legend with its sport-turned-street style. The original, which debuted in 1968, was geared for sprints, hurdles, and sweatbands with its padded nylon-suede styling and knack for collecting medals. It's reissued here, in all its Glory (less the tube socks) and is fully equipped with a padded tongue and arch support. Fresh details include its leather upper and modern color palette.
